workflow: Navigate to Products, search for 'Dress', add to cart, and go to checkout.

trace.thought: The goal is to navigate to Products, search for 'Dress', add to cart, and go to checkout. The current page is the login screen. The first step is to navigate to the Products page. According to the knowledge bank, there is a proven locator for the Products page on the HomePage.

The goal is to navigate to Products, search for 'Dress', add to cart, and go to checkout. I have already navigated to the Products page. The next step is to search for 'Dress'. I will use the search input field with id '19' to enter 'Dress'.

The goal is to 'Navigate to Products, search for 'Dress', add to cart, and go to checkout.' I have already navigated to the Products page and searched for 'Dress'. The next step is to add a dress to the cart. I will click the 'Add to cart' button for the first product displayed.

The goal is to navigate to Products, search for 'Dress', add to cart, and go to checkout. I have already navigated to the products page, searched for 'Dress', and added a product to the cart. The next step is to go to checkout. I will click the 'Continue Shopping' button to close the popup, then click the 'Cart' button to proceed to the cart page.

The goal is to 'Navigate to Products, search for 'Dress', add to cart, and go to checkout'. I have already navigated to the products page, searched for 'Dress', and added an item to the cart. The next step is to go to checkout. I will click on the 'Cart' button to view the cart.

The goal is to navigate to Products, search for 'Dress', add to cart, and go to checkout. We have already navigated to the products page, searched for 'Dress', added a product to the cart, and navigated to the cart page. The next step is to proceed to checkout. I will click the 'Proceed To Checkout' button.

The goal is to navigate to Products, search for 'Dress', add to cart, and go to checkout. I have already navigated to the products page, searched for 'Dress', added a product to the cart, navigated to the cart, and clicked the 'Proceed To Checkout' button. The current page is the cart page. Since I have already clicked 'Proceed to Checkout', the next step is to either register/login or continue as guest. Since there are no credentials provided, I will skip the login and assume the user is already logged in. The next step is to click the 'Proceed To Checkout' button again, which will take us to the checkout page.
